meanings.definition: A board or frame used for carrying a load on the back.
meanings.sent1: The hiker strapped the packboard to his back before starting the trail.
meanings.sent2: The packboard made it easier for the explorer to carry all his gear through the jungle.
meanings.sent3: Carrying a packboard felt like having a helpful friend on your back.
meanings.sent4: The packboard became his trusty companion on every adventure.
meanings.sent5: The bright red packboard stood out against the green forest, a beacon of preparedness.

meanings.definition: To load or carry on a packboard.
meanings.sent1: She carefully packboarded the supplies for the camping trip.
meanings.sent2: They decided to packboard all the equipment for the expedition.
meanings.sent3: Packboarding the heavy boxes seemed like a fun challenge.
meanings.sent4: He packboarded his worries away as he trekked up the mountain.
meanings.sent5: The team efficiently packboarded the necessary tools for the construction project.
